text: Shigesato Itoi ( Itoi Shigesato, born November 10, 1948 in Gumna) is a famous Japanese copywriter, essayist, and game designer. In his video game career, one of his most well-known works has been the EarthBound series, which began in 1989 with the release of EarthBound Beginnings and ended in 2006 with the release of Mother 3. == References == Category:1948 births Category:Mother (video game series) Category:Japanese voice actors Category:Japanese video game designers Category:Living people Category:People from Gunma Prefecture
